## Item Cycler

Allows cycling thru all items.
Use D-Pad Left and Right to cycle items

<details>
<summary>Reveal Code</summary>

```armv7
002D1DF4 E35500FF
002D203C EB0EB810

E1A04000 E92D403F

E28F4078 E5D41001 
E5933000 E5D02038 
E35200FF 0A000004 
E3130030 0A000011

1A00000E E3130010
```
